text: Eduardo Guillermo Feinmann (Buenos Aires, October 31, 1958) is an Argentine lawyer, journalist, political analyst, radio and television presenter. His confrontational and direct style has led him to make controversial statements. Feinmann describes himself as center-right and is against legalization of drugs and abortion; he is also recognized as a conservative.Pretérito Imperfecto: Lecturas Críticas Del Acontecer. Leonor Arfuch, Gisela Catanzaro ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Argentine journalists Category:Argentine lawyers
title: Eduardo Feinmann
